title: Famers abouts games in ranks
body: To this day when ever i play ranked i always find someone that complain about me having about 600-700 games and I'm still in platinum rank… I started out in silver 2 this season now I'm platinum i honestly think thats as far as i can go for now but next year I'm wanting to go higher :) but i find it so disappointing that people make fun of others because they chose to play ranks and  not an extensive amounts of normals all year and end up getting made fun of when they have achieved something. Atleast i feel really good about myself that I've gotten to Platinum i knew my goal this season was Gold 5 but i some how got to finish at Platinum 2 and got to finish in a Diamond 5 rank team :)

replies.body:
if you have 600-700 games in ranked and you have climbed to plat then there is no problem. congrats on plat man

but imo 600-700 games stuck in silver is an issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Bento Box,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IOmTBeNV,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-12-23T07:55:20.046+0000)
>
> if you have 600-700 games in ranked and you have climbed to plat then there is no problem. congrats on plat man
> 
> but imo 600-700 games stuck in silver is an issue.

Thanks :) yeah being stuck in silver was a problem last season and i hated it but now I'm stuck in platinum for about 6 months now xD but I'm glad where I've finished not even angry
AHHH my title is wrong :< Flamers*
